6a11714d-ca8e-4f8f-8c32-697e4cb761fe:::||@!@||:::2025-06-23T02:08:48:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6a11714d-ca8e-4f8f-8c32-697e4cb761fe","title":{"en":"A Regressor's Tale of Cultivation"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"회귀수선전"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["id","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"Is infinite regression a blessing– or a curse? For Eunhyeon, it is a fate that he desperately wishes to escape. Seven beings fall into the world of cultivators. d4fa3801-8e6c-40c8-a62e-8f87ac44ee17:::||@!@||:::2025-06-23T02:08:48:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d4fa3801-8e6c-40c8-a62e-8f87ac44ee17","title":{"en":"Manga Yonin Shosei"},"altTitles":[{"fr":"Quatre Japonais à San Francisco: 1904-1924"},{"en":"The Four Immigrants Manga"},{"ja":"漫画四人書生"},{"ru":"Манга о четырёх иммигрантах"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["ru"],"description":{"en":"From Stone Bridge Press :\nA \"documentary comic book\" from 1931, depicting the true adventures of four young Japanese men in America. Originally published in Japanese in San Francisco in 1931, The Four Immigrants Manga is Henry Kiyama’s visual chronicle of his immigrant experiences in the United States. Drawn in a classic gag-strip comic-book style, this heartfelt tale, rediscovered and translated by manga expert Frederik L. Schodt, is a fascinating, entertaining depiction of early Asian American struggles.\n\nNote: Won in the Heritage Selection category at the 51st Angoulême International Comics Festival in 2024","fr":"Quatre japonais à San Francisco est une bande dessinée unique en son genre. Sa naissance, en soi, est hors-norme. Un peintre japonais, arrivé aux États-Unis en 1904, s'essaye au comic strip naissant et dessine patiemment 52 récits tirés de son quotidien. C'est à compte d'auteur que le livre sera publié en 1931, avant que Kiyama rentre au Japon et poursuive dans son pays natal la diffusion des techniques occidentales de dessin. Chaînon manquant de l'histoire du comics et du manga, cette pépite oubliée ne manquera pas de passionner tous ceux qui s'intéressent à l'histoire du médium et à ses influences internationales. C'est aussi une des plus anciennes autobiographies qui ait été réalisée en bande dessinée, ainsi qu'un portrait authentique de l'Amérique de l'entre-deux-guerres et de l'immigration japonaise. Racisme, inégalités sociales, tremblement de terre et première guerre mondiale y sont abordés. Un document à plus d'un titre.\n\nMarque: ONAPRATUT REV","ru":"В начале XX века четверо молодых японцев эмигрируют в Сан-Франциско. Там они принимают американские имена и стремятся освоить западные обычаи и найти своё счастье. Генри (альтер эго автора) поступает в художественную школу, чтобы изучать западный стиль живописи. Чарли изучает американскую демократию. Фред планирует стать успешным фермером, а Фрэнк хочет стать процветающим торговцем. На этом пути они непосредственно переживают события, повлиявшие на Северную Калифорнию и Соединённые Штаты того времени: землетрясение 1906 года, Всемирную выставку и Первую мировую войну."},"links":{"mu":"fslzslr"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}}]}

620feae6-fd79-4aa5-be76-5bb2c10f2ae4:::||@!@||:::2025-06-23T02:08:48:::||@!@||:::{"id":"620feae6-fd79-4aa5-be76-5bb2c10f2ae4","title":{"en":"Umenosuke-kun wa Danshiryou no Onnanoko"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"梅之助くんは男子寮の女の子"},{"en":"Umenosuke-kun is a girl in the boys' dormitory"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Umenosuke lives in a university dorm for guys, where he spends his days doing muscle training as a hobby, amongst his valued male friends and fun-loving seniors. 6fddfae6-012a-4cea-88ba-37a5aabc7e7f:::||@!@||:::2025-06-23T02:08:49:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6fddfae6-012a-4cea-88ba-37a5aabc7e7f","title":{"en":"Unrivaled Spear Demon"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"槍鬼無双"},{"ko":"창귀무쌍"},{"pt-br":"Demônio da Lança Incomparável"},{"en":"Unrivaled Spear Ghost"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["ru","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"Shuji, a soldier who danced with death many times while on the battlefield, was possessed by the grudges and resentment of those he had killed. He too was eventually killed, but somehow he awoke in a younger version of himself.\n\nHe returned to a time when he was still an errand boy, inexperienced with war, but retained his memories. Remembering Kyo Aiyo, his comrade and savior, Shuji travelled to the ‘Tiger Pit’ Sect. However, instead of the strong and reliable woman, he was met with a cheerful and petite girl. He recalled the tragic past that had caused her to devote herself to the army, where in his previous life her family had fallen apart due to false rumors.\n\n‘This time, I will protect you.’\n\nHe vowed to repay the kindness he received in his previous life by changing her fate. With a spear in his right hand, Shuji steps into the battlefield once again, becoming the Unrivaled Spear Demon.","pt-br":"Shuji, um soldado que dançou com a morte inúmeras vezes no campo de batalha, foi possuído pelo rancor e ressentimento daqueles que matou. Ele também acabou sendo morto, mas de alguma forma acordou em uma versão mais jovem de si mesmo.\n\nEle retornou a um tempo em que ainda era apenas um garoto de recados, inexperiente na guerra, mas manteve suas memórias. Lembrando-se de Kyo Aiyo, sua companheira e salvadora, Shuji viajou até a Seita do ‘Poço do Tigre’. No entanto, em vez da mulher forte e confiável que conhecia, encontrou uma garota alegre e pequena. Ele se lembrou do passado trágico que a levou a se dedicar ao exército — em sua vida anterior, a família dela havia sido destruída por falsos rumores.\n\n\"Desta vez, eu vou te proteger.\"\n\nEle jurou retribuir a bondade que recebeu em sua vida passada, mudando o destino dela. Com uma lança em sua mão direita, Shuji entra mais uma vez no campo de batalha, tornando-se o Demônio da Lança Inigualável."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CWP25CL9","mu":"sdavdyc"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

db5195d5-d514-49a2-a9d5-d41e087a043c:::||@!@||:::2025-06-23T02:08:49:::||@!@||:::{"id":"db5195d5-d514-49a2-a9d5-d41e087a043c","title":{"en":"NonNonBa"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"のんのんばあとオレ"},{"ja-ro":"Nonnonbaa to Ore"},{"en":"Nonnonba and Me"},{"pl":"Babcia Noncia i ja"},{"ru":"Бабушка Ноннон"},{"fr":"NonNonBâ (Cornélius)"}],"lastChapter":"3","description":{"en":"The first English translation of Mizuki's best-loved work\n\nNonNonBa is the definitive work by acclaimed Gekiga-ka Shigeru Mizuki, a poetic memoir detailing his interest in yokai (spirit monsters). Mizuki's childhood experiences with yokai influenced the course of his life and oeuvre; he is now known as the forefather of yokai manga. His spring 2011 book, Onward Towards Our Noble Deaths, was featured on PRI's The World, where Marco Werman scored a coveted interview with one of the most famous visual artists working in Japan today.\n\nWithin the pages of NonNonBa, Mizuki explores the legacy left him by his childhood explorations of the spirit world, explorations encouraged by his grandmother, a grumpy old woman named NonNonBa. NonNonBa is a touching work about childhood and growing up, as well as a fascinating portrayal of Japan in a moment of transition. NonNonBa was the first manga to win the Angoulême Prize for Best Album. Much like its namesake, NonNonBa is at once funny and nostalgic, grounded in a sociohistorical context and floating in the world of the supernatural.","fr":"Nous sommes au début des années 1930, dans une petite ville de la côte ouest du Japon. NonNonBâ, une vieille dame misérable, mystique et superstitieuse, est accueillie dans la famille du jeune Shigeru. Encyclopédie vivante des croyances et légendes populaires de la région, elle abreuve l'imaginaire déjà débordant du petit garçon d'histoires de monstres et de fantômes. Les yôkaï, ces créatures surnaturelles qui peuplent l'univers des hommes, deviennent vite les compagnons de rêverie quotidiens de Shigeru, qui trouve en eux d'excellents guides pour visiter les mondes invisibles.\n\nSi ces voyages l'aident à fuir et à comprendre les émotions parfois compliquées qui naissent dans son coeur, ils embrouillent aussi considérablement sa vie quotidienne: il est déjà bien assez difficile de savoir à qui se fier sans que des monstres bizarres et malicieux viennent s'en mêler... En conjuguant le ton de la chronique et les ambiances fantastiques qui ont fait sa réputation depuis Kitaro le repoussant (également publié aux éditions Cornélius), Shigeru Mizuki livre avec NonNonBô une oeuvre aussi touchante qu'exigeante.\n\nS'inspirant des jours heureux de son enfance, il écrit la partition universelle du temps qui passe, du bonheur éphémère et de l'urgence de vivre, laissant à ses lecteurs le souvenir impérissable des rivages de Sakai-minato et réveillant pour chacun d'eux les accords précieux des nostalgies les plus intimes."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/のんのんばあとオレ-水木しげる漫画大全集-コミッククリエイトコミック-水木しげる-ebook/dp/B07MD74LQ5/ref=monarch_sidesheet_image","bw":"de387c63b4-43ba-4141-8e72-1971221e683c","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-110808","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/519016/","engtl":"https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/nonnonba/","mu":"ihlrw36"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

c526f6fc-bc56-4b0b-85bc-a82f7ee3b65f:::||@!@||:::2025-06-23T02:08:52:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c526f6fc-bc56-4b0b-85bc-a82f7ee3b65f","title":{"en":"The World's Most Useless Parenting Book"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"世界一役に立たない育児書"},{"ja-ro":"Sekai Ichi Yaku ni Tatanai Ikujisho"}],"lastChapter":"5","description":{"en":"There are many childcare books in the world that are said to be “useful”, but there are few that are “useless”. But the truth is, there is no right answer when it comes to childcare, so even if the know-how in a childcare book is said to be useful, it may not be suitable for your child at that time. First of all, children do not always understand words and logic. That's why Kanemoto, a manga artist who is also raising a child, has devised a childcare book that gives a realistic understanding of the process from pregnancy to caring for infants and toddlers!\n- “What changes does the body undergo during pregnancy?”\n- “I'm worried about my child's small appetite.”\n- “What are the tips for raising children without scolding them?”\n\nSuch questions and worries are answered in a fun way. The good thing about this book is that it may seem useless, but paradoxically may be useful. When you're worn out from diligently raising your child, when you're tired but can't sleep, or when you're not sure what to give as a baby gift to a friend, please pick up this book. Parents who work hard every day raising their children, this book is an encouragement to them!\n\n**Contents:**\n“What is the most useless parenting book in the world!?”, “The most useless parenting consultation room in the world”\nChapter 1: Pregnancy And Childbirth\nChapter 2: Children And Meals\nChapter 3: Childcare Basics\nChapter 4: Useful Childcare Tips\nChapter 5: Living With Children\nExtra: Parenting With Data\n\nSupervised and recommended by pediatrician Dr. Morito Yasumi! But then—suddenly, he loses consciousness. Realizing this, Tasuku starts by building a cabin, some furniture, a lush vegetable garden, even a stone bath... and thus begins his self-sufficient life in another world. Compared to his old life as an overworked, underpaid office drone, he finds real happiness in creating his very own territory in a world free of obligations. Just one month into campus life, he accidentally walks back into a lecture hall to grab his forgotten wallet - only to stumble upon two men in the middle of a heated encounter. Despite countless encounters, he’s never been in a real relationship. To him, physical intimacy is all that matters. And for Eunseong, he’s exactly what she needs right now. 4a90b13d-6497-467c-a949-6a674ebaba25:::||@!@||:::2025-06-23T02:08:57:::||@!@||:::{"id":"4a90b13d-6497-467c-a949-6a674ebaba25","title":{"en":"Fushiou no Musuko"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"不死王の息子"},{"en":"The Son of the Immortal King"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"\"The Apothecary Diaries\" author Natsu Hyuuga's new frontier!\n\n---\nA Cannibalism Comedy with Supernaturals × an Immortal Girl × Death Flags\n\n\"Hey... What kind of meat is this?\" Set in modern-day Japan — though it’s a world where supernatural beings like werewolves and vampires live quite normally. The boy, who introduces himself as Fushio Yamada, is actually the son of the Immortal King. A lawless war zone.\n\nAfter rolling through hell for ten years, I became…\n\nThe leader of the prison.\n\n\"Hey, Mint. You might wanna chill.\"\n\"I’m afraid I don’t know what you’re talking about, sir.\"\n\nI ended up a swaggering prison gang leader.\nBut hey, I’m fine with this.\nThis is what we call the privilege of a long-time survivor.\n\n\"On paper, you’ll be considered dead. In return, you’ll do a job for me.\"\n\"I’m afraid I still don’t understand, sir.\"\n\nThen a chance came—like a lie made real.\n\n\"Help me, and I’ll get you released.\"\n\"What do you need, Master?\"\n\"...\"\n\nThe prison chief gave an order to me—now known as the prison’s #1 certified nutcase:\n\n\"Turn the new guy into the boss of this prison.\"\n\nThey call it prison, but this place is a total free-for-all.\nAnd if I manage to crown one man as the next boss, I finally get out.\n\n\"But the place you're going to… is the men’s prison.\"\n\"...Huh? I don’t exactly have the thing for that?\"\n\"Disguise. Got it? Disguise!\"\n\n…Except—oops?\nTurns out that new recruit? He’s the original male lead.\n\n#ReincarnatedTenYearsTooSoon\n#AndNowI’mInPrison?! O método de Rui é... bastante inesperado.\n_______________\n\u003e ㅤ\n«Então, é por isso que... você vai ser minha namorada.»\n«Hã...?»\n--------------------\nAs regras de seu novo relacionamento são simples: a primeira que fizer a outra se submeter completamente provará que é digna de governar a escola! E assim começa uma guerra secreta de sedução, com cada garota lançando uma ofensiva total para fazer a outra se apaixonar primeiro.\n_______________\nNesta batalha acirrada, qual coração — e corpo — será o primeiro a se render? E quem será aquela que irá conquistá-los? f831976f-4dfd-45aa-a183-2f123a379f4a:::||@!@||:::2025-07-07T02:08:15:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f831976f-4dfd-45aa-a183-2f123a379f4a","title":{"en":"New Journey of Yaji and Kita"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"新 やじきた道中記"},{"en":"Yaji and Kita's Travelogue : from Edo to Ise"},{"fr":"La vraie histoire du voyage de Yaji et Kita, d'Edo à Ise"},{"fr":"La nouvelle histoire du voyage de Yaji et Kita, d'Edo à Ise"},{"fr":"La vraie histoire des étapes de Yaji et Kita, d'Edo à Ise"},{"en":"The real story of Yaji and Kita's Travel"},{"ja-ro":"Shin Yajikita Douchuuki"}],"lastChapter":"6","relatedIds":["701e67c9-45b2-459b-a517-a0cb9865def8"],"description":{"en":"**Yajisan and Kitasan's unusual journey: \n*Their unexpected companion is Sazae-san!?***\n\n\nFor the first time, the entire phantom series is collected in one book right up to the final episode! (new book published 09/Jul/2025)\n\n*New Journey of Yaji and Kita* is a parody manga of \"[Tōkaidōchū Hizakurige](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/T%C5%8Dkaid%C5%8Dch%C5%AB_Hizakurige)\" written by Hasegawa Machiko, the creator of [Sazae-san](https://mangadex.org/title/701e67c9-45b2-459b-a517-a0cb9865def8/sazae-san). This is the first book to compile the entire series, originally serialized in \"Weekly Asahi\" in the 1940s, all the way to the final chapter.\n\nThis title marks Machiko's first attempt at a period piece, a work beloved of kabuki and period dramas. It depicts the unusual journey of the beloved mismatched duo Yaji and Kita from Nihonbashi in Edo to Ise. Sazae-san even makes an appearance along the way.\nIt was hugely popular when it was serialized in \"[Weekly Asahi](https://www.mangaupdates.com/publishers/publication?name=Asahi+Shinbun)\" and was even made into a film in 1952.\nIt has been published in book form several times, but the story ends abruptly around Kuwana-juku (Mie Prefecture), leaving the final seven chapters unpublished. Four of the seven stories were later redrawn and included in another book ([Apron Obaa-san](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/qmfbqqq/apron-oba-san) Volume 5), but the remaining three chapters have never been published anywhere.\nThis time, three stories not previously published in a book, including the final story, will be included for the first time.\n___\n[Hasegawa Machiko](https://mangadex.org/author/8f2e39bf-ed1a-4ee5-a36e-622a6dcb4d33/hasegawa-machiko), who loved Kabuki and period dramas, first tried her hand at serializing a topknot manga with \"Shin Yajikita Douchuuki/New Journey of Yaji and Kita\".\nIt is an adaptation of \"Tokai Dochu Hizakurige\" by Jippensha Ikku, written in the Edo period, and depicts the amusing journey of Yaji-san and Kita-san from Edo to Ise.\n\nWhile incorporating episodes reminiscent of the original work, Machiko's unique humorous and fun journey unfolds, and the Sazae-san family also appears along the way.\n\nThey will stop by real cities like :\n- Odawara\n- Hamamatsu\n- Okazaki","ja":"やじさんときたさんの珍道中\n道づれにまさかのサザエさん！？\n\n\nまぼろしの連載の最終回までが初めて一冊に！\n\n\n\n「サザエさん」の作者、長谷川町子による「東海道中膝栗毛」のパロディ漫画。\n昭和20年代に「週刊朝日」に連載された作品を、初めて最終話まで一冊にまとめた単行本。\n\n「新やじきた道中記」は、歌舞伎や時代劇を愛した町子が、初めて時代物に挑戦した作品で、万人に愛される、やじさん、きたさんの凸凹コンビによる江戸・日本橋から伊勢までの珍道中を描いている。　旅の途中にサザエさんも登場するなどした。\n\n「週刊朝日」連載当時、大人気となり、映画化もされている。その映画『新やじきた道中』（1952年公開）には、花菱アチャコと横山エンタツが、弥次郎兵衛、喜多八を演じている。\n\nこれまで数回単行本化されているが、桑名宿（三重県）を過ぎたあたりで突然終わり、最後の7話が未収録だった。7話のうち4話はのちに描き直して別の著書（『エプロンおばさん』 第5巻）に収録したが、残り3話はどこにも収録されていない。今回は最終話を含む単行本未収録の3作品も初めて収録する。\nFrom [kyohyo](https://www.kyohyo.co.jp/publication/detail.html?id=218).\n___\n\n歌舞伎や時代劇が好きだった長谷川町子が初めてマゲモノの連載に挑戦した漫画作品、それが「新やじきた道中記」です。江戸時代に書かれた十返舎一九じっぺんしゃいっくの「東海とうかい道中どうちゅう膝栗毛ひざくりげ」をアレンジしたもので、やじさんときたさんの江戸から伊勢までのゆかいな旅が描かれています。原作を彷彿とさせるエピソードも盛り込みつつ、町子ならではの滑稽で楽しい旅が繰り広げられ、途中でサザエさん一家も登場します。この「新やじきた道中記」は1951（昭和26）年11月4日から1952（昭和27）年12月28日まで『週刊朝日』に連載され、のちに姉妹社から全2巻で単行本化されました（1952・1953年発行）。また、約20年後には改訂版も出版しています（1971・1972年発行）。\n\nFrom [New Journey of Yaji and Kita Exposition](https://www.hasegawamachiko.jp/memorial-future/4461/)"},"links":{"mu":"rhth2f6","raw":"https://www.kyohyo.co.jp/publication/detail.html?id=218"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b11fda93-8f1d-4bef-b2ed-8803d3733170","name":{"en":"4-Koma"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice
